About.Hours & facilities: Open Mon-Fri 9am-5pm, Sat 11:30pm-5pm. Closed Sundays and public holidays. Photocopying, microfilm reading and printing, microfiche reading and printing, Internet, soundproof room, video viewing, CD and cassette listening posts, genealogy CDRoms.

About.Acquisition focus: Material relating to the history, development or culture of the region, including published and unpublished material.

About.Major holdings: Local newspaper on microfilm and in cutting collection, ephemera, oral history tapes, maps, videos, photographs, books, private archives, family history resources.

Contact.Street address: Joondalup Library, 102 Boas Avenue, Joondalup WA 6027

Contact.Postal address: Local Studies Library, Box 21, Joondalup WA 6919
